description.value:
Hired to violently kill someone. Some see the slaying of a worthy target as payment enough, some require additional incentive such as keeping all or part of the victim's body, or a few drops of blood from the requester. If Requisition is a double there are numerous additional casulties, if 4+ DoF, death cult may see the requester as their next sacrifice.

Requirements

The Hiring of those dedicated to the ending of lives. Some are devout worshippers of The Emperor, some less so.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
